alert.note: Alert for Burnett (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Pine, southwestern St. Louis, Carlton and west central Burnett Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 815 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Fond Du Lac Band Brookston Area, to near Kettle River, to near Sandstone, moving north at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cloquet, Pine City, Hinckley, Hermantown, Proctor, Sandstone, Scanlon, Carlton, Mahtowa, Barnum, Floodwood, Cotton, Willow River, Wrenshall, Askov, Cromwell, Rutledge, Holyoke, Kettle River, and Thomson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. These storms may intensify. Monitor local NOAA Weather Radio, commercial radio, or television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
